content:
I'm happy to help you with toy recommendations for Max! However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have any information about Max, such as his species, age, size, or preferences. Could you please provide more context or details about Max so I can give you more tailored suggestions?

Also, it's great to hear that you've got him a new food bowl and measuring cup! It's always exciting to get new goodies for our pets. Stainless steel bowls are a great choice, and grain-free kibble can be a wonderful option for many pets. If you have any questions about Max's diet or nutrition, I'd be happy to help with that as well!

Please share more about Max, and I'll do my best to recommend some fun and suitable toys for him!
